title: Introducing Critical Energy Theory! Late Capitalism Induced Delirium 12.08.21
itunes:title: Introducing Critical Energy Theory! Late Capitalism Induced Delirium 12.08.21
description:
In episode 1045, Jack and Miles are joined by musician, author, and comedian Chris Crofton to discuss We’re fucked: Introducing Critical Energy Theory!, Speaking of regressing…, Justin Bieber-Branded Donuts are Taking Canada by Storm, For Some Reason and more!

  1. We’re fucked: Introducing Critical Energy Theory!
  2. Speaking of regressing…
  3. Justin Bieber-Branded Donuts are Taking Canada by Storm, For Some Reason
  4. I Tried Justin Bieber's New 'Timbiebs' & As Far As Snacks Go, I'm A Belieber
  5. Would you wear the new ‘Timbiebs’ merch? Justin Bieber and Tim Hortons unveil collection
  6. McDonald's Launches a Line of Mariah Carey Merch to Celebrate Holiday Collab — and It's All Free


Follow: @thecroftonshow

Listen: Cold Brew Got Me Like Podcast

Pre-order: The Advice King Anthology by Chris Crofton

Listen: If I Take I Need by Sideshow
